description: Butterfly weed (Asclepias tuberosa) is an amazing plant species that provides beautiful blooms and nourishment to a variety of butterflies, bees, and other pollinators. Its bright, vibrant orange flowers make for a stunning addition to any garden and its long blooming season is sure to delight gardeners of all levels. The plant is incredibly drought tolerant and has low maintenance requirements, making it an ideal choice for xeriscaping or dry rock gardens. Its deep roots combat erosion, provide shelter for wildlife, and are essential in improving soil health. It's a must-have for anyone looking to bring a bit of beauty to their garden!
